channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: M. Asam Beauty Is Our Tradition
channel.desc: Enjoy younger looking skin with M.Asam, an effective skincare range that blends innovative technique and ingredients including grape oil, to target fine lines and wrinkles.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Bobbi Brown
channel.desc: Bobbi Brown revolutionised the beauty industry 20 years ago, and today continues to teach women to look and feel their best through her simple philosophy and award winning make-up and skincare.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Blancr?me Paris
channel.desc: Indulge in skincare from Blancreme Paris, boasting high quality formulas in beautiful bottles for a truly pampering beauty experience.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Look Good, Feel Good
channel.desc: Find the best in health and fitness products to give you a spring in your step and a healthier lifestyle. From top tips and great gadgets, we'll help you to revitalise your daily routine.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: QVC Selection
channel.desc: With specially chosen products from across the QVC range, there's something for everyone in the QVC Selection.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Friday Night Beauty
channel.desc: Gorgeous meets groundbreaking every Friday night on QVC, with a showcase of the best of the best in skincare, cosmetics, haircare and beauty tools - it's not to be missed.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Margaret Dabbs London
channel.desc: Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Prime Fifty Supplements
channel.desc: The Prime Fifty range features nutritional supplements tailored specifically to the needs of the over 50s and beyond, helping you to have the time of your life in the prime of your life.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves...
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Blancr?me Paris
channel.desc: Indulge in skincare from Blancreme Paris, boasting high quality formulas in beautiful bottles for a truly pampering beauty experience.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Feel Good Beauty
channel.desc: Find time-saving solutions, with a range of gadgets that aim to make everyday living that little bit easier and more comfortable.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: L'Occitane
channel.desc: Discover a range of bath, body and home products from Provence, formulated with natural ingredients such as olive, verbena, lavender and shea butter.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: My Hair Doctor
channel.desc: Join us for My Hair Doctor from Guy Parsons, an industry professional whose knowledge of hair and scalp health, plus his hairdressing skills has enabled him to create this premium haircare range.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Friday Night Beauty
channel.desc: Gorgeous meets groundbreaking every Friday night on QVC, with a showcase of the best of the best in skincare, cosmetics, haircare and beauty tools - it's not to be missed.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves with Dyson Haircare
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love, featuring Dyson's high-tech Supersonic Hairdryer.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Summer Wellbeing Heroes
channel.desc: Summer Wellbeing Heroes.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Laura Geller on Easy Pay
channel.desc: Spread the cost of Laura Geller make-up with our interest-free Easy Pay instalment offers, and treat yourself to her fabulous range of ever-popular cosmetics.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: The Tova Collection
channel.desc: Inspired by the glamour of the classic Hollywood era, The Tova Collection features glamorous jewellery recreated from Tova's own personal collection, plus romantic fragrances for men and women.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Summer Beauty ft James Read
channel.desc: James Reed showcases his summer must-haves to ensure you feel tanned, toned and beautiful when the sun comes out to play.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: M. Asam Beauty Is Our Tradition
channel.desc: Enjoy younger looking skin with M.Asam, an effective skincare range that blends innovative technique and ingredients including grape oil, to target fine lines and wrinkles.
